name: Not A Box
description:
A multiplayer stealth game for 2-10 players where the guard tries to find and shoot the prop players before they escape.

Controls Guard

Mouse to move camera

Scroll Wheel to zoom (alternatively W and S keys or + and - to zoom in and out)

MMB or F for flashlight

LMB to shoot

RMB to switch to the next camera

D to switch to next camera

A to switch to previous

Prop

Mouse to move camera

WASD to move around

Q and E to rotate

Scroll to zoom

MMB  or F to become the targeted object

R to stand up
